Reference
=========

This page presents all the models provided by scim2-models.

.. data:: scim2_models.AnyResource
   :type: typing.TypeVar

   Type bound to any subclass of :class:`~scim2_models.Resource`.

.. data:: scim2_models.ExternalReference
   :type: typing.Type

   External reference type as described in :rfc:`RFC7643 ยง7 <7643#section-7>`.

.. data:: scim2_models.URIReference
   :type: typing.Type

   URI reference type as described in :rfc:`RFC7643 ยง7 <7643#section-7>`.

   :members:
